title: Dara Khosrowshahi Just Delivered Incredible News for Uber Stock Investors
desc: Uber is gearing up to lead the autonomous ride-hailing industry.

title: Roy Keane Hammers Man City For Disrespectful Actions In Slot Interview
desc: Roy Keane criticised the setup Manchester City for what he felt was some disrespect towards Liverpool during Arne Slot's post-match interview.

title: Scientists turn sunflower oil waste into a powerful bread upgrade
desc: Researchers have found a surprising way to turn sunflower oil waste into a powerful bread upgrade. By replacing part of wheat flour with partially defatted sunflower seed flour, breads became dramatically richer in protein, fiber, and antioxidants—while also offering potential benefits for blood sugar and fat digestion.

title: Woman found dead at Kāpiti Coast home, man arrested
desc: A 24-year-old man has been charged with wounding with intent to cause grievous bodily harm.

title: Japan’s Leader Set for Big Win in Snap Election
desc: Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi was on course for a sweeping mandate from voters for her economic policies and tough stance on immigration and China.

title: Washington Post chief executive Will Lewis steps down after mass lay
desc: Will Lewis says "difficult decisions" had been made to ensure the newspaper's future.

title: How figure skating and copyright law became 'despicable' opponents, and the Canadian pair caught in middle

title: NCDMB Issues New Rules for Nigerian Oil Contracts
desc: Nigeria's NCDMB has released new guidelines for oil contracts to eliminate unqualified middlemen and streamline the contracting process, effective Dec 2025

title: 'Send Help' Wins Super Bowl Box Office as 'Melania' Tumbles to No. 10
desc: Studios avoided the Super Bowl once again, leaving the field wide open for others, including a K-pop Stray Kids concert pic and a Kevin James film.
